```{r}
data <- read.csv("~/bio_sample_file.csv")
print(data)
```
```{r}
set.seed(42)
sample <- sample(c(TRUE, FALSE), nrow(data), replace=TRUE, prob=c(0.8,0.2))
train  <- data[sample, ]
test   <- data[!sample, ]
X <- subset(train, select = c("vitaa_unic"))
Z <- subset(train,select=c("q104"))
Y <- subset(train,select=c("muac"))
Y <- Y[["muac"]]

Xt <- subset(test, select = c("vitaa_unic"))
Zt <- subset(test,select=c("q104"))
Yt <- subset(test,select=c("muac"))
Yt <- Yt[["muac"]]
```

```{r}
bw <- npplregbw(xdat=X, zdat=Z, ydat=Y)
```


```{r}
pl <- npplreg(bws=bw,exdat = Xt,eydat=Yt,ezdat=Zt)
```
```{r}
summary(pl)
```

```{r}
print(pl['MSE'])
```
```{r}
bw_smooth <- npscoefbw(xdat=X, ydat=Y, zdat=Z)
sc <- npscoef(bws = bw_smooth,bandwidth.compute = FALSE,xdat=X, ydat=Y, zdat=Z,exdat = Xt,eydat=Yt,ezdat=Zt)
summary(sc)
print(sc['MSE'])
```
```{r}
plot(sc)
```
```{r}
plot(pl)
```
